RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOBEER was away alertly to set the pace on the inside, shook clear on the turn and drew off in the stretch to prove much the best, ridden out. SHY DA RUNNER was bumped at the start, stalked the winner and was two wide on the turn and proved to be no match for the winner, second best. SPINNING MUSICIAN was rated early, ridden along three wide on the turn and was empty in the lane. FIERCE AND STRONG chased the pace and was on the inside on the turn and weakened. THERE WAS A FIFTEEN MINUTE DELAY INTO THE START OF THIS RACE DUE TO A TOTE BOARD ISSUE, FOLLOWED BY A FRACTIOUS HORSE IN THE GATE WHICH RESULTED IN A LATE SCRATCH.

ENTRY.NAME: Fierce and Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Shy Da Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace, 2 wide turn, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Mobeer
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, drew off stretch, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Spinning Musician
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, 3 wide turn, empty stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE MARCH 2, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 2 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 2 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where En tered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KATE'S GOLDEN DUDE was well placed early on the inside, shifted out on the turn and made a three wide bid nearing the quarter pole, took over leaving the turn and drew out in the lane whiole being ridden out smartly. ASLUCKWOULDHAVIT set the early pace in the two path, dropped down to the inside on the turn and was headed leaving the turn, proved to be no match for the winner, second best. ECONOMIC POWER chased the pace four wide, then was three wide on the turn and came four wide into the lane while trying to get out slightly nearing the quarter pole, but had no kick in the drive, bested rest. BAILEY was bumped at the start, advanced five wide on the turn and had a belated rally for the minor rewards. PERUVIAN BOY was settled early, saved ground on the turn and had no rally. VOUCH was not a threat while wide. WAHOOWA WAHOOWA chased the pace five wide early, four wide on the turn and weakened. NAUTICAL NATURE chased the pace two wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Kate's Golden Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, bid 3 wide, drew out stretch, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Nautical Nature
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 2 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Peruvian Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Economic Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Asluckwouldhavit
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2 wide, inside turn, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bailey
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, 5 wide advance turn, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Wahoowa Wahoowa
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 5 wide, 4 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Vouch
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, wide turn, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIRENETTA was allowed to settle early, advanced on the inside to the five sixteenths marker, shifted out and made a four wide bid nearing the quarter pole, shifted back in leaving the turn and drew clear to prove best, driving. BABKA moved up on the inside to prompt the pace, made a bid on the backstretch to vie for command to the quarter pole, then proved to be no match for the winner but clearly second best. APRILS LUCK chased the early pace and was four wide on the backstretch and weakened, bested rest. Z KITTY stalked the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn but weakened. CANDY FLASH was off slowly, then showed no speed and was never a factor. SCARLET WARRIOR set the pace two wide and then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Sirenetta
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, shift out 5/16, bid 4 wide 1/4, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Babka
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace inside, bid inside, vied inside, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Z Kitty
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, void early speed, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Aprils Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide backstretch, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlet Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 2 Allowed 2 l bs. A Race Since January 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONSAFE was well placed on the inside, boxed by the quarter pole, angled out three wide leaving the turn and made a bid to edged away late under a drive. MIDTOWN ROSE dueled for the lead on the outside, made a two wide bid leaving the turn but was out kicked by the winner, second best. SEEKING THE DREAM dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened the final furlong, bested rest. TIMELY TRADITION tracked the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn and came four wide into the lane and weakened in the lane. JACKIE THE JOKER was allowed to settle early and lacked a rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Moonsafe
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, boxed 1/4, angled out upper, bid, edged away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Country Life Farm & Fifteen Moons LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking the Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened 1/8, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie the Joker
ENTRY.OWNER: Fanelli John LC Racing LLC and Longball Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Timely Tradition
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, bid 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Midtown Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bid 2 wide, out kicked, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since January 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACTOTUM was away alertly to set the pace on the inside, drew clear on the turn, then drew out in the stretch to prove much the best under left handed crop urging. INSTANT CHAOS was allowed to settle and was four wide on the backstretch, made a three wide move on the turn to move into contention, but could not gain on the winner late, second best. INNUENDO was allowed to settle early, advanced three wide on the turn but lacked the needed stretch winning bid. MR BOLDACIOUS was off a step slow, moved up to stalk the pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn and weakened. LONG TOM was reserved early, four wide on the turn and had no rally. JUMP FREE tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. BOSSY CAT stalked the pace three wide, two wide on the turn and tired. JACK GAVE BACK was settled back early, then was eased after the half mile marker, walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Innuendo
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, needed stretch bid, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Jump Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Factotum
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, drew clear turn, drew out, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Gave Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Instant Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 1/2, 3 wide move, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Long Tom
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 4 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Bossy Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, 2 wide turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Boldacious
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, stalked 4 wide, bid 3 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 2. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAY BUCK was away alertly to set the pace while uncontested and in the two path, widened the margin on the turn and then was ridden out in the drive to remain clear to prove best. FLOWER'S FORTUNE was four wide into the first turn, rated along early, made a three wide move on the turn and finished willingly to hold on to the place award. NOT IN THE MOOD was reserved early, made a five wide move on the turn and came six wide into the lane and had a late rally to gain the show award. ARCTICA was allowed to settle early, advanced four wide on the turn, angled in and missed the show award. SMOKIN CLASS was rated along the inside and lacked a rally. JUSTIN TIME tracked the pace three wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Not in the Mood
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 5 wide move turn, late rally, got show

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin Class
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Arctica
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide turn, angled in, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Hay Buck
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace 2 wide, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Justin Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Flower's Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, rated early, 3 wide move turn, willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SLINGSHOT BOY was rated along the inside early, eased out on the turn and came three wide into the lane and made a bid and drew clear in the furlong grounds to prove best, driving. RIVERBOAT BANDIT was bumped at the start, reserved on the inside, angled out by the furlong marker and finished willingly for the place award. DON'T QUESTION ME was reserved early, came four wide into the lane and was along for the show but needed more. TAKING WHAT'S MINE prompted the early pace, made a bid on the turn to duel for command but weakened the final furlong. DR GREENTHUMB set the pace on the inside, then dueled for command by the quarter pole and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Greenthumb
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dueled 1/4, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Slingshot Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, came 3 wide, bid, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, reserved inside, angled out 1/8, willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Taking What's Mine
ENTRY.OWNER: Brooks Gerald E and Hess Jr Carl L
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Question Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 3 wide, came 4 wide, along for show
